results.title: Anchovy
results.description: There’s a reason that real Italian pizza has anchovies: these little fish are chock full of savory, salty, umami flavor. In addition to tasting great, anchovies are some of the most nutritious and sustainable fish on the planet: they’re full of Omega 3’s and protein. Anchovy pizza is a classic Italian dish that’s elegantly simple and perfect with a simple salad and a glass of wine.

results.title: Margherita
results.description: Pizza Margherita (more commonly known in English as Margherita pizza) is a typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt and extra-virgin olive oil. Traditionally, it is made with fior di latte (cow's milk mozzarella) rather than buffalo mozzarella.

results.title: Prosciutto
results.description: The peppery arugula combined with the paper-thin salty prosciutto and the buttery parmesan on a crispy crust makes the perfect Spring dinner

results.title: Tomato
results.description: This summery pizza topped with juicy fresh tomatoes is simple, classic, and totally satisfying.
